name: Tei-guidelines
tagline: Hugh's copy of the TEI Guidelines
body:
### TEI Pointers Revision

This copy of the [TEI Guidelines](Guidelines-web/en/html/index.html) shows the latest version of the [TEI Pointers](https://github.com/hcayless/TEI_Pointers_Draft) revisions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
